effects.display_string: Set: Your damaging spells have a chance to hit a Jackpot!, launching a Shattering Star at 3 nearby enemies at 100% effectiveness. Casting Dragonrage always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Casting Shattering Star or hitting a Jackpot! increases the damage of your next empower spell by 25%, stacking up to 2 times.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 331 Intellect up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 77,294 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 115,947.
Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to lase your target for Precision Blasting, calling in Mister Lock-N-Stalk to deal 1 million Physical damage to your target.
Use: Recalibrate for Mass Destruction. (20 Sec Cooldown)

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Cloak of the Woodland Raccoon

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to call down a Voltaic Stormrook, inflicting 314,797 Nature damage split between nearby enemies and granting 2,400 Haste, further increased for each enemy struck.
